  16. (* Main program of the ocamltest test driver *)

  18. open Ocamltest_stdlib
  19. open Tsl_semantics

  21. ‌type behavior =
  22.   | Skip_all_tests
  23.   | Run of Environments.t

  25. (*
  26. let first_token filename =
  27.   let input_channel = open_in filename in
  28.   let lexbuf = Lexing.from_channel input_channel in
  29.   Location.init lexbuf filename;
  30.   let token =
  31.     try Tsl_lexer.token lexbuf with e -> close_in input_channel; raise e
  32.   in close_in input_channel; token

  34. let is_test filename =
  35.   match first_token filename with
  36.     | exception _ -> false
  37.     | Tsl_parser.TSL_BEGIN_C_STYLE | TSL_BEGIN_OCAML_STYLE -> true
  38.     | _ -> false
  39. *)

  41. (* this primitive announce should be used for tests
  42.    that were aborted on system error before ocamltest
  43.    could parse them *)
  44. ‌let announce_test_error test_filename error =
  45.   Printf.printf " ... testing '%s' => unexpected error (%s)\n%!"
  46.     (Filename.basename test_filename) error

  48. ‌let tsl_block_of_file test_filename =
  49.   let input_channel = open_in test_filename in
  50.   let lexbuf = Lexing.from_channel input_channel in
  51.   Location.init lexbuf test_filename;
  52.   match Tsl_parser.tsl_block Tsl_lexer.token lexbuf with
  53.     | exception e -> close_in input_channel; raise e
  54.     | _ as tsl_block -> close_in input_channel; tsl_block

  56. ‌let tsl_block_of_file_safe test_filename =
  57.   try tsl_block_of_file test_filename with
  58.   | Sys_error message ->
  59.     Printf.eprintf "%s\n%!" message;
  60.     announce_test_error test_filename message;
  61.     exit 1
  62.   | Parsing.Parse_error ->
  63.     Printf.eprintf "Could not read test block in %s\n%!" test_filename;
  64.     announce_test_error test_filename "could not read test block";
  65.     exit 1

  67. ‌let print_usage () =
  68.   Printf.printf "%s\n%!" Options.usage

  70. ‌type result_summary = No_failure | Some_failure | All_skipped
  71. ‌let join_result summary result =
  72.   let open Result in
  73.   match result.status, summary with
  74.   | Fail, _
  75.   | _, Some_failure -> Some_failure
  76.   | Skip, All_skipped -> All_skipped
  77.   | _ -> No_failure

  79. let join_summaries sa sb =
  80.   match sa, sb with
  81.   | Some_failure, _
  82.   | _, Some_failure -> Some_failure
  83.   | All_skipped, All_skipped -> All_skipped
  84.   | _ -> No_failure

  86. ‌let rec run_test log common_prefix path behavior = function
  87.   Node (testenvspec, test, env_modifiers, subtrees) ->
  88.   Printf.printf "%s %s (%s) %!" common_prefix path test.Tests.test_name;
  89.   let (msg, children_behavior, result) = match behavior with
  90.     | Skip_all_tests -> "=> n/a", Skip_all_tests, Result.skip
  91.     | Run env ->
  92.       let testenv0 = interpret_environment_statements env testenvspec in
  93.       let testenv = List.fold_left apply_modifiers testenv0 env_modifiers in
  94.       let (result, newenv) = Tests.run log testenv test in
  95.       let msg = Result.string_of_result result in
  96.       let children_behavior =
  97.         if Result.is_pass result then Run newenv else Skip_all_tests in
  98.       (msg, children_behavior, result) in
  99.   Printf.printf "%s\n%!" msg;
  100.   join_result
  101.     (run_test_trees log common_prefix path children_behavior subtrees) result

  103. ‌and run_test_trees log common_prefix path behavior trees =
  104.   List.fold_left join_summaries All_skipped
  105.     (List.mapi (run_test_i log common_prefix path behavior) trees)

  107. and run_test_i log common_prefix path behavior i test_tree =
  108.   let path_prefix = if path="" then "" else path ^ "." in
  109.   let new_path = Printf.sprintf "%s%d" path_prefix (i+1) in
  110.   run_test log common_prefix new_path behavior test_tree

  112. ‌let get_test_source_directory test_dirname =
  113.   if (Filename.is_relative test_dirname) then
  114.     Sys.with_chdir test_dirname Sys.getcwd
  115.   else test_dirname

  117. ‌let get_test_build_directory_prefix test_dirname =
  118.   let ocamltestdir_variable = "OCAMLTESTDIR" in
  119.   let root =
  120.     Sys.getenv_with_default_value ocamltestdir_variable
  121.       (Filename.concat (Sys.getcwd ()) "_ocamltest")
  122.   in
  123.   if test_dirname = "." then root
  124.   else Filename.concat root test_dirname

  126. ‌let tests_to_skip = ref []

  128. ‌let init_tests_to_skip () =
  129.   tests_to_skip := String.words (Sys.safe_getenv "OCAMLTEST_SKIP_TESTS")

  131. ‌let test_file test_filename =
  132.   let start = if Options.show_timings then Unix.gettimeofday () else 0.0 in
  133. ‌  let skip_test = List.mem test_filename !tests_to_skip in
  134. ‌  let tsl_block = tsl_block_of_file_safe test_filename in
  135. ‌  let (rootenv_statements, test_trees) = test_trees_of_tsl_block tsl_block in
  136. ‌  let test_trees = match test_trees with
  137.     | [] ->
  138.       let default_tests = Tests.default_tests() in
  139.       let make_tree test = Node ([], test, [], []) in
  140.       List.map make_tree default_tests
  141.     | _ -> test_trees in
  142. ‌  let used_tests = tests_in_trees test_trees in
  143. ‌  let used_actions = actions_in_tests used_tests in
  144. ‌  let action_names =
  145.     let f act names = String.Set.add (Actions.name act) names in
  146.     Actions.ActionSet.fold f used_actions String.Set.empty in
  147. ‌  let test_dirname = Filename.dirname test_filename in
  148. ‌  let test_basename = Filename.basename test_filename in
  149. ‌  let test_prefix = Filename.chop_extension test_basename in
  150. ‌  let test_directory =
  151.     if test_dirname="." then test_prefix
  152.     else Filename.concat test_dirname test_prefix in
  153. ‌  let test_source_directory = get_test_source_directory test_dirname in
  154. ‌  let hookname_prefix = Filename.concat test_source_directory test_prefix in
  155. ‌  let test_build_directory_prefix =
  156.     get_test_build_directory_prefix test_directory in
  157. ‌  let clean_test_build_directory () =
  158.     try
  159.       Sys.rm_rf test_build_directory_prefix
  160.     with Sys_error _ -> ()
  161.   in
  162.   clean_test_build_directory ();
  163.   Sys.make_directory test_build_directory_prefix;
  164. ‌  let log_filename =
  165.     Filename.concat test_build_directory_prefix (test_prefix ^ ".log") in
  166. ‌  let log =
  167.     if Options.log_to_stderr then stderr else begin
  168.       open_out log_filename
  169.     end in
  170. ‌  let summary = Sys.with_chdir test_build_directory_prefix
  171.     (fun () ->
  172.        let promote = string_of_bool Options.promote in
  173.        let default_timeout = string_of_int Options.default_timeout in
  174.        let install_hook name =
  175.          let hook_name = Filename.make_filename hookname_prefix name in
  176.          if Sys.file_exists hook_name then begin
  177.            let hook = Actions_helpers.run_hook hook_name in
  178.            Actions.set_hook name hook
  179.          end in
  180.        String.Set.iter install_hook action_names;

  182. ‌       let reference_filename = Filename.concat
  183.            test_source_directory (test_prefix ^ ".reference") in
  184. ‌       let make = try Sys.getenv "MAKE" with Not_found -> "make" in
  185. ‌       let initial_environment = Environments.from_bindings
  186.            [
  187.              Builtin_variables.make, make;
  188.              Builtin_variables.test_file, test_basename;
  189.              Builtin_variables.reference, reference_filename;
  190.              Builtin_variables.test_source_directory, test_source_directory;
  191.              Builtin_variables.test_build_directory_prefix,
  192.                test_build_directory_prefix;
  193.              Builtin_variables.promote, promote;
  194.              Builtin_variables.timeout, default_timeout;
  195.            ] in
  196. ‌       let rootenv =
  197.          Environments.initialize Environments.Pre log initial_environment in
  198. ‌       let rootenv =
  199.          interpret_environment_statements rootenv rootenv_statements in
  200. ‌       let rootenv = Environments.initialize Environments.Post log rootenv in
  201. ‌       let common_prefix = " ... testing '" ^ test_basename ^ "' with" in
  202. ‌       let initial_status =
  203.          if skip_test then Skip_all_tests else Run rootenv
  204.        in
  205. ‌       let summary =
  206.          run_test_trees log common_prefix "" initial_status test_trees in
  207.        Actions.clear_all_hooks();
  208.        summary
  209.     ) in
  210.   if not Options.log_to_stderr then close_out log;
  211.   begin match summary with
  212.   | Some_failure ->
  213.       if not Options.log_to_stderr then
  214.         Sys.dump_file stderr ~prefix:"> " log_filename
  215.   | No_failure | All_skipped ->
  216.       if not Options.keep_test_dir_on_success then
  217.         clean_test_build_directory ()
  218.   end;
  219.   if Options.show_timings && summary = No_failure then
  220. ‌    let wall_clock_duration = Unix.gettimeofday () -. start in
  221.     Printf.eprintf "Wall clock: %s took %.02fs\n%!"
  222.                    test_filename wall_clock_duration

  224. ‌let is_test s =
  225.   match tsl_block_of_file s with
  226.   | _ -> true
  227.   | exception _ -> false

  229. ‌let ignored s =
  230.   s = "" || s.[0] = '_' || s.[0] = '.'

  232. ‌let sort_strings = List.sort String.compare

  234. ‌let find_test_dirs dir =
  235.   let res = ref [] in
  236.   let rec loop dir =
  237.     let contains_tests = ref false in
  238.     Array.iter (fun s ->
  239.         if ignored s then ()
  240.         else begin
  241.           let s = dir ^ "/" ^ s in
  242.           if Sys.is_directory s then loop s
  243.           else if not !contains_tests && is_test s then contains_tests := true
  244.         end
  245.       ) (Sys.readdir dir);
  246.     if !contains_tests then res := dir :: !res
  247.   in
  248.   loop dir;
  249.   sort_strings !res

  251. ‌let list_tests dir =
  252.   let res = ref [] in
  253.   if Sys.is_directory dir then begin
  254.     Array.iter (fun s ->
  255.         if ignored s then ()
  256.         else begin
  257.           let s' = dir ^ "/" ^ s in
  258.           if Sys.is_directory s' || not (is_test s') then ()
  259.           else res := s :: !res
  260.         end
  261.       ) (Sys.readdir dir)
  262.   end;
  263.   sort_strings !res

  265. let () =
  266.   init_tests_to_skip()

  268. let () =
  269. ‌  let failed = ref false in
  270. ‌  let work_done = ref false in
  271. ‌  let list_tests dir =
  272.     match list_tests dir with
  273.     | [] -> failed := true
  274.     | res -> List.iter print_endline res
  275.   in
  276. ‌  let find_test_dirs dir = List.iter print_endline (find_test_dirs dir) in
  277. ‌  let doit f x = work_done := true; f x in
  278.   List.iter (doit find_test_dirs) Options.find_test_dirs;
  279.   List.iter (doit list_tests) Options.list_tests;
  280.   List.iter (doit test_file) Options.files_to_test;
  281.   if not !work_done then print_usage();
  282.   if !failed || not !work_done then exit 1
